      This method allows to add a new music library inside the application invoking a DirectoryChooser.
      void applyChangesToPlayPauseButton()
      This method stops the current song and the cover animation when the play button state is paused, else maintains the song and the cover art animation working until the current song finishes.

      • applyChangesToPlayPauseButton

        public void applyChangesToPlayPauseButton()
        This method stops the current song and the cover animation when the play button state is paused, else maintains the song and the cover art animation working until the current song finishes.

      • showResult

        public void showResult(Song s)
        This method allows to show a new window with the searched song in a table view.
        Parameters:
        s - A Song that represents the searched song in the current music folder.

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog(java.lang.String message)
        This method allows to know what was the searching time if the song was found. Else, it allows to know why the wasn't be found in the music folder.
        Parameters:
        message - A String that represents the sorting time if the searching is achieved. Else, it shows that searching can't be performed such by the searched song is not in that folder or the user introduced a invalid input.
